So what does the HTC U11 have to offer? We gave the phone a confident 4/5
stars in our [full HTC U11
review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/htc-u11), praising its fast
performance, brilliant camera and outstanding Hi-Res Audio support.

A couple of contentious features include the incredibly shiny, fingerprint-
catching design and its lack of a headphone jack. You might not find them too
irksome, though, and they certainly don’t take away from the HTC U11’s
generally high-end appeal.

for that screen in your pocket for 4G shenanigans that often.

## Best HTC U11 deals: 16GB to 40GB

If you want lots of freedom to use 4G as you please for stuff like music
streaming, watching TV and playing on apps, then we recommend a data allowance
between 16GB and around 25GB. Anything pushing the 30GB point is stepping into
serious 4G territory. You might want to consider one of these bumper deals if
you use your phone for both work and personal purposes. If you really want to
squeeze the most out of every second you have the HTC U11 in your hand, then
the 40GB realms and beyond are where you should head.

If you’ve got space in your life for a colossal 40GB data allowance, then
